<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Setting the Override approval policy and Approval flow fields from Require approval field in Reservable module record</description>
        <name>Set approval policy in reservable module</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[// Sys Ids of OOB Reservabel Module
var RESERVABLE_MODULE_DEMO_DATA = ['5db44502dbb650106c731dcd13961937', '2b636b7e1b4e60103523ff751a4bcbe2', 'fc71f64fdb42a01097acc900399619a8', 'c31241cedb7650106c731dcd13961917', 'ff51c98edb7650106c731dcd13961984'];

setOverrideApprovalPolicy();

function setOverrideApprovalPolicy() {
    if (isCustomerUpgrading()) {
        sn_wsd_core.WPLogger.info('setOverrideApprovalPolicy', 'Starting fix script to populate Override approval policy and Approval flow fields value from Require approval in Reservable module record.');
        var reservableModuleGr = new GlideRecord(WSDConstants.TABLES.ReservableModule.name);
        reservableModuleGr.addQuery('sys_id', 'NOT IN', RESERVABLE_MODULE_DEMO_DATA.join());
        reservableModuleGr.addQuery('require_approval', true);
        reservableModuleGr.query();

        while (reservableModuleGr.next()) {
            reservableModuleGr.override_approval_policy = WSDConstants.OVERRIDE_APPROVAL_POLICY.always_required;
            reservableModuleGr.update();
        }
        sn_wsd_core.WPLogger.info('setOverrideApprovalPolicy', 'Finishing fix script to populate Override approval policy and Approval flow fields value from Require approval in Reservable module record.');
    }
}

function isCustomerUpgrading() {
    var reservableModuleGr = new GlideRecord(WSDConstants.TABLES.ReservableModule.name);
    return reservableModuleGr.isValidField('require_approval');
}]]></script>
